title: Front-End Development
description: Building the visual and interactive parts of websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Back-End Development
description: Managing the server, database, and logic for dynamic web apps using Node.js and Express.

title: Database Management
description: Designing and managing databases with MongoDB and SQL for efficient data storage.

title: Version Control
description: Using Git & GitHub for code collaboration, version tracking, and team workflows.

title: API Integration
description: Connecting applications via REST APIs for seamless data exchange and automation.

title: UI/UX
description: Designing clean, user-friendly interfaces that enhance usability and experience.
